trans-unit.source: Defines the codes associated with the ASP.NET health monitoring events.
trans-unit.target: 定義與 ASP.NET 健康監視事件關聯的代碼。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes> class contains codes that identify types of health-monitoring events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes>類別包含識別的健全狀況監視類型的程式碼的事件。

trans-unit.source: Two types of codes are defined within the class: major codes, which identify the ASP.NET health-monitoring events; and detail codes, which provide more information about a related major code.
trans-unit.target: 類別內定義的程式碼的兩種類型： 主要程式碼，找出 ASP.NET 健康監視事件。和詳細資料代碼，其中提供相關的主要程式碼的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: These codes are implemented as integers, rather than as an enumeration, to allow for extensibility.
trans-unit.target: 這些程式碼會實作為整數，而不是列舉型別，以提供擴充性。

trans-unit.source: When a health-monitoring event is raised, it is associated with a major event code.
trans-unit.target: 健全狀況監視的事件引發時，它是主要事件的程式碼相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following list identifies the categories of major event codes that are defined within the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes> class:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單識別的類別定義內所定義的主要事件代碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes>類別：

trans-unit.source: **Application codes**.
trans-unit.target: **應用程式程式碼**。

trans-unit.source: Application codes identify events in the lifetime of an application, such as startup and shutdown events.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼會識別事件存留期間的應用程式，例如啟動和關閉事件。

trans-unit.source: Their values are greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase> field constant.
trans-unit.target: 其值都大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>欄位常數。

trans-unit.source: They are associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> event type.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>事件類型。

trans-unit.source: The heartbeat event is a special kind of application event.
trans-unit.target: 活動訊號事件是特殊種類的應用程式事件。

trans-unit.source: It identifies events raised at periodic intervals to provide information relative to the state of the running process.
trans-unit.target: 它會識別提供狀態執行的處理序的相關資訊的定期間隔引發事件。

trans-unit.source: It is associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebHeartbeatEvent> event type.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.Management.WebHeartbeatEvent>事件類型。

trans-unit.source: **Request codes**.
trans-unit.target: **要求代碼**。

trans-unit.source: Request codes identify non-error events that provide per-request information.
trans-unit.target: 要求程式碼識別非錯誤事件，提供每個要求的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Their values are greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestCodeBase> field constant.
trans-unit.target: 其值都大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestCodeBase>欄位常數。

trans-unit.source: They are associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent> event type.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent>事件類型。

trans-unit.source: **Error codes**.
trans-unit.target: **錯誤代碼**。

trans-unit.source: Error codes identify events that contain information about two kinds of errors: errors specifically related to a Web request and systemic errors.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤代碼可識別包含兩種錯誤的相關資訊的事件： 與 Web 要求和系統錯誤特別相關的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The errors related to Web requests include unhandled exceptions, view-state errors, and input-validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 與 Web 要求相關的錯誤會包含未處理例外狀況、 檢視狀態錯誤，以及輸入驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: They are associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> event type.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>事件類型。

trans-unit.source: The systemic errors relate to configuration or application code, including parser errors and compilation errors.
trans-unit.target: 系統錯誤關聯的設定或應用程式的程式碼，包括剖析器錯誤和編譯錯誤。

trans-unit.source: They are associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> event type.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>事件類型。

trans-unit.source: Both kinds of errors have values greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ErrorCodeBase> field constant.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種錯誤有值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ErrorCodeBase>欄位常數。

trans-unit.source: **Audit codes**.
trans-unit.target: **稽核代碼**。

trans-unit.source: Audit codes identify events that contain auditable information such as login attempts, access security violations, and authorization violations.
trans-unit.target: 稽核代碼可識別包含可稽核的資訊，例如登入嘗試，存取安全性違規，以及授權違規的事件。

trans-unit.source: Their values are greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 其值都大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: They are associated with <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent> and its derived event types.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuditEvent>和其衍生的事件類型。

trans-unit.source: **Miscellaneous codes**.
trans-unit.target: **其他代碼**。

trans-unit.source: Miscellaneous codes do not identify events but are used to flag nonstandard event information.
trans-unit.target: 其他的程式碼不會識別事件，但可用來使用非標準的事件資訊的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Their values are greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 其值都大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Refer also to <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 也請參閱<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation>如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇上方的程式碼值來建立您自己的自訂事件程式碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>。

trans-unit.source: In the `eventMappings` health-monitoring configuration element, you can optionally specify an event-code range.
trans-unit.target: 在`eventMappings`健全狀況監視的組態項目，您可以選擇性地指定事件程式碼範圍。

trans-unit.source: If the event code range is specified, the mapping only applies to the events that have an event code within that range; otherwise, it applies to all the event codes.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定事件的程式碼範圍，則對應只適用於具有在該範圍內; 事件程式碼的事件否則，它會套用到所有的事件代碼。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file excerpt shows the <xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider> configured to handle <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent> events whose event codes belong to the audit category.
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔摘錄顯示<xref:System.Web.Management.EventLogWebEventProvider>設定處理<xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>其事件代碼屬於稽核類別目錄的事件。

trans-unit.source: You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以選擇上方的程式碼值來建立您自己的自訂事件程式碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring application event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視應用程式事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase> value represents the offset for major event codes associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>值代表位移與相關聯的主要事件代碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: All application codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有應用程式程式碼會指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has finished.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式的編譯已完成。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCompilationEnd> value is a major code and its value is greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCompilationEnd>值是主要的程式碼，其值是大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>值。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET raises the related <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> event when the compilation of the application ends.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 引發相關<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>編譯的應用程式結束時的事件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has started.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式的編譯已開始。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCompilationStart> value is a major code and its value is greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCompilationStart>值是主要的程式碼，其值是大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>值。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET raises the related <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> event when the compilation of the application starts.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 引發相關<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>編譯的應用程式啟動時的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the application detail event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別應用程式詳細資料事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationDetailCodeBase> value represents the offset for the detail event code range associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationDetailCodeBase>值代表位移與詳細資料事件的程式碼範圍相關聯的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: All application detail codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationDetailCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有應用程式詳細資料代碼指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationDetailCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a heartbeat event occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生活動訊號事件。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationHeartbeat> is a major code and its value is greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationHeartbeat>主要的程式碼，且其值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET raises the related <xref:System.Web.Management.WebHeartbeatEvent> event at a periodic interval, as defined by the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 引發相關<xref:System.Web.Management.WebHeartbeatEvent>在定期間隔中，組態檔所定義的事件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that an application has shut down.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式已關閉。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> is a major code and its value is greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> 主要的程式碼，且其值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET raises the related <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> event when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 引發相關<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>當應用程式關閉時引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory was changed or renamed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式 Bin 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBinDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> is the detail code that specifies the causes of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBinDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>是指定關機的原因的詳細資料程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBinDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>.
trans-unit.target: 當應用程式的 Bin 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBinDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the Browsers application directory was changed or renamed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 Browsers 應用程式目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBrowsersDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBrowsersDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When a subdirectory in the Browsers application directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBrowsersDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>.
trans-unit.target: 當瀏覽器應用程式目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBrowsersDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the build manager has made a change that requires the application domain to be shut down.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，指出建置管理員所進行的變更，需要關閉應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBuildManagerChange> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBuildManagerChange> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the build manager has made a change that requires the application domain to be shut down, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBuildManagerChange>.
trans-unit.target: 當組建管理員所進行的變更，需要關閉應用程式定義域，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownBuildManagerChange>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the Global.asax file has changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 Global.asax 檔案已變更。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInGlobalAsax> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInGlobalAsax> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the Global.asax file is changed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInGlobalAsax>.
trans-unit.target: Global.asax 檔案變更時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInGlobalAsax>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the security policy file has changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示安全性原則檔已變更。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInSecurityPolicyFile> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInSecurityPolicyFile> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the security policy file is changed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInSecurityPolicyFile>.
trans-unit.target: 變更安全性原則檔時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownChangeInSecurityPolicyFile>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the App_Code directory was changed or renamed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 App_Code 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownCodeDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownCodeDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When a subdirectory in the App_Code directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownCodeDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>.
trans-unit.target: 當 App_Code 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownCodeDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the configuration file has changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示組態檔已變更。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownConfigurationChange> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownConfigurationChange> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the configuration file is changed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownConfigurationChange>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 組態檔變更時，會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownConfigurationChange>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the hosting environment is shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示裝載環境正在關閉。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHostingEnvironment> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHostingEnvironment>是指定關閉原因的詳細資料程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When the hosting environment is shutting down, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHostingEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: 當裝載環境正在關閉時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHostingEnvironment>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the ASP.NET run time was explicitly closed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 ASP.NET 執行階段已明確關閉。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHttpRuntimeClose> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHttpRuntimeClose> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the ASP.NET run time is explicitly closed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHttpRuntimeClose>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 執行階段明確地關閉時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownHttpRuntimeClose>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the idle time-out was exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示已超過閒置 (Idle) 逾時期限。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownIdleTimeout> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownIdleTimeout>是指定關閉原因的詳細資料程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When the idle time-out is exceeded, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownIdleTimeout>.
trans-unit.target: 當超過閒置逾時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownIdleTimeout>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating an application-initialization error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生應用程式初始化錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownInitializationError> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownInitializationError> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When an application-initialization error occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownInitializationError>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式初始化錯誤發生時，會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownInitializationError>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the maximum number of recompilations was reached.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示已達最大重新編譯次數。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownMaxRecompilationsReached> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownMaxRecompilationsReached> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the maximum number of recompilations is reached, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownMaxRecompilationsReached>.
trans-unit.target: 當達到重新編譯的最大數目時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownMaxRecompilationsReached>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the physical path of the application has changed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式的實體路徑已變更。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownPhysicalApplicationPathChanged> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownPhysicalApplicationPathChanged> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the physical path of the application is changed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownPhysicalApplicationPathChanged>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式的實體路徑變更時，會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownPhysicalApplicationPathChanged>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the App_Resources directory was changed or renamed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 App_Resources 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownResourcesDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownResourcesDirChangeOrDirectoryRename> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When a subdirectory in the App_Resources directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownResourcesDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>.
trans-unit.target: 當 App_Resources 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownResourcesDirChangeOrDirectoryRename>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the application shutdown reason is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式關閉的原因不明。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnknown> is the detail code that specifies the causes of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnknown> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the application shuts down for an unknown reason, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnknown>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式關閉因不明原因，當引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnknown>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the application domain was explicitly unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式定義域已明確卸載。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnloadAppDomainCalled> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnloadAppDomainCalled> 是指定關機的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the application domain is explicitly unloaded, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnloadAppDomainCalled>.
trans-unit.target: 明確卸載應用程式定義域時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdown>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationShutdownUnloadAppDomainCalled>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that an application has started.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式已啟動。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationStart> is the major code that refers to the start of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationStart> 是指的是應用程式的開頭的主要程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When the application starts, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationStart>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 應用程式啟動時，會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationStart>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring audit event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視稽核事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditCodeBase> value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>, <xref:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent>, <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent>, <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>, and <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditCodeBase>值表示的位移，與主要事件的程式碼範圍相關聯的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent>， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent>， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>，和<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: All audit codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有稽核代碼都指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET audit-detail event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 稽核詳細資料事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditDetailCodeBase> represents the offset for the detail-event-code range associated with audit events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditDetailCodeBase> 代表相關聯的稽核事件的詳細資料事件程式碼範圍的位移。

trans-unit.source: All audit detail codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditDetailCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有稽核的詳細資料代碼都指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditDetailCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生檔案授權失敗。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationFailure> is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is not granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationFailure> 是主要的程式碼相關未獲得授權的存取權的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When a file-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 發生檔案授權失敗時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization success occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生檔案授權成功。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationSuccess> is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationSuccess> 是主要的程式碼相關授權授與存取權的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When a file authorization is successful, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationSuccess>.
trans-unit.target: 檔案授權成功時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFileAuthorizationSuccess>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a form authentication failure occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生表單驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure> is the major code for the health event related to user's authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure> 是主要的程式碼與使用者的驗證失敗相關的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When this event happens, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 當此事件發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a form-authentication success occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生表單驗證成功。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationSuccess> is the major code for the health event related to a user's authentication success.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationSuccess>是與使用者驗證成功的健全狀況事件的主要程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationSuccess>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationSuccess>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the view-state verification failed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示檢視狀態驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure> is the major code for the health event related to view-state verification failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure> 是主要的程式碼與檢視狀態驗證失敗相關的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a membership-authentication failure occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生成員資格驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationFailure> is the major code for the health event related to a user's membership-authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationFailure>是與使用者的成員資格驗證失敗相關的健全狀況事件的主要程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a membership-authentication success occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生成員資格驗證成功。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationSuccess> is the major code for the health event related to a user's membership-authentication success.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationSuccess> 是主要的程式碼的相關使用者的成員資格驗證成功的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationSuccess>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationSuccess>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled access exception occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生未處理的存取例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledAccessException> is the major code for the unhandled health event related to the access of a resource for which authorization is not granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledAccessException> 是主要的程式碼未處理的健全狀況事件相關的授權未授與的資源的存取權。

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledAccessException>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledAccessException>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled security exception occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生未處理的安全性例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledSecurityException> is the major code of the unhandled health event related to a security violation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledSecurityException> 是主要的程式碼的相關安全性違規的未處理的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When an unhandled security exception is thrown, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledSecurityException>.
trans-unit.target: 擲回未處理的安全性例外狀況時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUnhandledSecurityException>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a URL-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生 URL 授權失敗。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationFailure> is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is not granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationFailure> 是主要的程式碼與 URL 未獲得授權的使用相關的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When the URL-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationFailure>.
trans-unit.target: URL 授權失敗發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a URL-authorization success occurred during a Web request.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生 URL 授權成功。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationSuccess> is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is granted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationSuccess> 是主要的程式碼，可讓您使用 URL 授權授與相關的健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: When a URL is successfully authorized, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationSuccess>.
trans-unit.target: 已成功授權 URL，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditUrlAuthorizationSuccess>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring error event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視錯誤事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ErrorCodeBase> value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> and <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ErrorCodeBase>值表示的位移，與主要事件的程式碼範圍相關聯的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>和<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: All error codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ErrorCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有的錯誤碼會指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ErrorCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is expired.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的票證已過期。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ExpiredTicketFailure> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ExpiredTicketFailure> 是指定使用者的驗證失敗的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the user's authentication fails due to an expired ticket, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ExpiredTicketFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者的驗證失敗，因為過期的票證時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ExpiredTicketFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the event code value is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示事件代碼值是不允許的。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidEventCode> represents the use of a code value that is not allowed by the system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidEventCode>代表的程式碼值，系統不允許使用。

trans-unit.source: For instance, this can happen if you customize an ASP.NET health-monitoring event and use a code value that is already assigned by the system.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，這種情況您自訂 ASP.NET 健康監視事件及使用已由系統指派的程式碼值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的票證無效。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidTicketFailure> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidTicketFailure> 是指定使用者的驗證失敗的原因詳細資料代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the user's authentication fails due to an invalid ticket, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidTicketFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者的驗證失敗，因為無效的票證時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationFailure>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidTicketFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的檢視狀態無效。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewState> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewState> 為指定的檢視狀態失敗原因的詳細資料程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When the view-state error occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewState>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 檢視狀態錯誤時，會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewState>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state failed the integrity check.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的檢視狀態未通過完整性檢查。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewStateMac> is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewStateMac> 為指定的檢視狀態失敗原因的詳細資料程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When the supplied view state fails the integrity check, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure> and a detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewStateMac>.
trans-unit.target: 當提供的檢視狀態失敗時的完整性檢查時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebViewStateFailureAuditEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditInvalidViewStateFailure>和詳細資料程式碼， <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.InvalidViewStateMac>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web miscellaneous event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視 Web 其他事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase> value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with health events that have not been categorized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>值代表未分類的健全狀況事件相關聯的主要事件的程式碼範圍的位移。

trans-unit.source: All miscellaneous codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 指派值大於所有其他代碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-request event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視 Web 要求事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestCodeBase> value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestCodeBase>值表示的位移，與主要事件的程式碼範圍相關聯的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: All request codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有要求程式碼會都指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was aborted.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 Web 要求已中止。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionAbort> is the major code that refers to a Web-request abnormal termination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionAbort> 是主要的程式碼，它是指 Web 要求的異常終止。

trans-unit.source: When a Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionAbort>.
trans-unit.target: 當 Web 要求中止時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionAbort>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was completed.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 Web 要求已完成。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionComplete> is the major code that refers to a Web request normal termination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionComplete> 是主要的程式碼，它是指 Web 要求正常終止。

trans-unit.source: When the Web request completes normally, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionComplete>.
trans-unit.target: Web 要求完成時通常，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RequestTransactionComplete>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the size of the posted information exceeded the allowed limits.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示張貼的資訊大小超過允許的限制。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorPostTooLarge> is the major code that refers to a data posting whose size exceeds the allowed limits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorPostTooLarge> 是主要的程式碼，它是指資料張貼其大小超過允許的限制。

trans-unit.source: When a form posts data that exceeds the allowed limits, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorPostTooLarge>.
trans-unit.target: 當表單張貼資料超過允許的限制時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorPostTooLarge>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request has been aborted.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 Web 要求已中止。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorRequestAbort> is the major code that refers to the abnormal termination of the Web request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorRequestAbort> 是主要的程式碼，它是指 Web 要求異常終止。

trans-unit.source: When the Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorRequestAbort>.
trans-unit.target: 當 Web 要求中止時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorRequestAbort>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating an unhandled exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生未處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorUnhandledException> is the major code that refers to the occurrence of an exception that is not handled by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorUnhandledException> 是主要的程式碼，它是例外的指不由 ASP.NET 處理狀況的項目。

trans-unit.source: When the exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorUnhandledException>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 例外狀況發生時，會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorUnhandledException>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a validation error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorValidationFailure> is the major code that refers to the occurrence of a validation exception that is not handled by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorValidationFailure> 是主要的程式碼，它是指不由 ASP.NET 驗證例外狀況的項目。

trans-unit.source: When this exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorValidationFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況發生時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorValidationFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that a view-state failure occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生檢視狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorViewStateFailure> is the major code that refers to a view-state failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorViewStateFailure> 是主要的程式碼所參考的檢視狀態失敗。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorViewStateFailure>.
trans-unit.target: 當發生這種情況時，ASP.NET 會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebRequestErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.RuntimeErrorViewStateFailure>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error accessing a web resource.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，指出存取 Web 資源時發生了錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the SQL provider dropped events.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示 SQL 提供者已卸除事件。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: When the notification occurs after the one during which events have been dropped, a special warning row is written to the SQL server.
trans-unit.target: 時通知發生事件已捨棄的期間之後，特殊的警告資料列會寫入至 SQL server。

trans-unit.source: This row is written before all other events in the notification, and is not counted in the total number of events as far as the configured flush size is concerned.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料列寫入之前，通知中的所有其他事件，就不會計算中的事件總數就有關設定排清的大小。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that an error occurred while communicating with the state server.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示在與狀態伺服器通訊時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: When a connection error occurs while communicating with the state server, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorOtherError> and detail code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.StateServerConnectionError>.
trans-unit.target: 連線發生錯誤時與狀態伺服器通訊時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorOtherError>和詳細資料的程式碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.StateServerConnectionError>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.StateServerConnectionError> is a detail code and its value is greater than the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.StateServerConnectionError>詳細程式碼，且其值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the major event code value is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示主要事件代碼未定義。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.UndefinedEventCode> represents the use of a major code value that is not defined by the system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.UndefinedEventCode> 表示使用了不由系統定義的主要程式碼值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that the detail event code value is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示詳細資料事件代碼未定義。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.UndefinedEventCode> represents the use of a detail code value that is not defined by the system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.UndefinedEventCode> 代表不由系統定義的詳細資料的程式碼值的用途。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a compilation error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示發生編譯錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorCompilationError> is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application compilation phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorCompilationError> 是指在應用程式編譯階段期間發生錯誤的主要程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorCompilationError>.
trans-unit.target: 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorCompilationError>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a configuration error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示發生組態錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorConfigurationError> is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-configuring phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorConfigurationError> 是指在應用程式設定階段期間發生錯誤的主要程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorConfigurationError>.
trans-unit.target: 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorConfigurationError>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of the type or value of an object.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，指出在物件型別或值的還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間發生了錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that an unclassified error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生未分類的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorOtherError> is the major code for an unclassified error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorOtherError> 是主要的程式碼的未分類的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorOtherError>.
trans-unit.target: 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorOtherError>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating a parser error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，表示發生剖析器錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorParserError> is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-parsing phase.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorParserError> 是指在應用程式剖析階段期間發生錯誤的主要程式碼。

trans-unit.source: When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent> with a major code of <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorParserError>.
trans-unit.target: 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 就會引發<xref:System.Web.Management.WebErrorEvent>與主要的程式碼的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebErrorParserError>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of a property.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，指出在屬性的還原序列化期間發生了錯誤。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-detail event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視 Web 詳細資料事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventDetailCodeBase> value represents the offset for the detail-event code range associated with the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventDetailCodeBase>值代表位移與詳細資料事件的程式碼範圍相關聯的<xref:System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: All application detail codes are assigned values greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationDetailCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 所有應用程式詳細資料代碼指派值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.ApplicationDetailCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event code used by providers to record nonstandard information about an event.
trans-unit.target: 表示事件代碼，提供者會使用這個代碼來記錄事件的非標準資訊。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation> is the major code used by providers to store nonstandard health event information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation> 主要的程式碼提供者使用來儲存非標準的健全狀況事件的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Its value is greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>.
trans-unit.target: 其值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.MiscCodeBase>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if ASP.NET health events are dropped during buffering, the <xref:System.Web.Management.SimpleMailWebEventProvider> adds a warning to the top of the messages without using the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation>.But the only way for the <xref:System.Web.Management.SqlWebEventProvider> to write this warning is to create a record in the database.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果期間緩衝，將會捨棄 ASP.NET 健全狀況事件<xref:System.Web.Management.SimpleMailWebEventProvider>將警告加入至頂端的訊息，而不使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation>。但的唯一方式就<xref:System.Web.Management.SqlWebEventProvider>撰寫這項警告是在資料庫中建立的記錄。

trans-unit.source: Because every record in the database needs an event ID, the provider uses the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation> as its major code and <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.SqlProviderEventsDropped> as the detail code to create this ID.
trans-unit.target: 提供者在資料庫中的每一筆記錄需要的事件識別碼，因為使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation>作為其主要的程式碼和<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.SqlProviderEventsDropped>與詳細資料的程式碼來建立此識別碼。

trans-unit.source: As you can see from the above discussion, the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation> is not associated with any ASP.NET health event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從上述的討論中，看到<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebEventProviderInformation>未與任何 ASP.NET 健全狀況事件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the offset for the custom event codes.
trans-unit.target: 識別自訂事件代碼的位移。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 這個欄位是常數。

trans-unit.source: If you create your own custom event, you must use an event code with a value greater than <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立您自己的自訂事件，您必須使用事件程式碼的值大於<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase>。
